subject: Re: 12-470 & 12-469 system on ebay

full_text:

Debbie



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Anyone want to reseacher with that Dynamic Duo Ghost Box System I put 
> together a couple weeks ago?  I've got it on ebay for just about what 
I 
> paid to put it together. $80
> http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=170186788084
> 
> It's got a hacked 12-470, a hacked 12-469, an audio mixer, the wall-
> wart power plug for the mixer, a microphone, and the cables to 
connect 
> it all.
> You'll just have to add your own speakers or recorder and plug those 
> into the mixer output cable.
> 
> - Mike
>
